DESCRIPTION_EN: Anti-viral: to treat Herpes Virus Diseases (Herpes Simplex, Herpes Zoster).
NOTE_EN:
Treatment need to be started very soon after the symptoms. 
 If started later than 24 hours in Varicella or 72 hours in Herpes Zoster, the treatment does not work: do not give
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: High doses (800 mg 5 times a day) can give confusion and hallucinations: you need to let the patient know.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Kidney disease; dehydration; with Theophylline.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Tirenedess, headache, rash, nausea, diarrhoea, vomiting.
INTERACTIONS_EN: If given together with Cotrimoxazole, Diclofenac, Gentamicin, Ibuprofen, Indomethacin, Meloxicam: increased risk of kidney toxicity.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ဆါ၊ တၢ်ထံသံးနိသံးလၢအအိၣ်၊ ဒီး (Theophylline) ။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
နမ့ၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်တွဲဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ် (Cotrimoxazole), (Diclofenac),
 (Gentamicin), (Ibuprofen), (Indomethacin), (Meloxicam) တဖၣ်အံၤန့ၣ်ကမၤဘၣ်ဒိအါထီၣ်၀ဲကလ့ၢ်တၢ်စုၣ်တၢ်ပျၢ်တဖၣ်လီၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat severe allergic reactions, anaphylactic shock. Can be used also in severe asthma
NOTE_EN:
- Use 1 cc syringes, to be able to measure well.
 - Give IM, not subcutaneously, for better absorption.
 - For babies: dilute the dose with NSS 0.2 cc.
 - You can repeat this dose several times at 5 minutes intervals, until blood pressure and pulse rate are back to normal.

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Anti worm (roundworms, pinworms, whipworms, hookworms).
NOT effective for FLAT worms (use Praziquantel or Niclosamide).
Can be used also for other worms infections, like Giardia, Cutaneous Larva Migrans,
Visceral Larva Migrans, Gnathostoma, Strongyloides, Neurocysticercosis.
NOTE_EN:
- Common worms:
 In heavy infections, repeat the dose after a few days - 1 week.
 To prevent heavy loads, give every 4 - 6 months to everybody in a community.
 - Neurocysticercosis:
 If you suspect Neurocysticercosis is better to refer to hospital where they can do a CT scan to confirm diagnosis. 
 It is advised to give in combination with Praziquantel. 
 Start therapy with Prednisolone a few days before.
FOOD_EN:
- Can be taken with or without food.
 - If taken with fatty meal, absorption is increased by 5 times
 - Tablets can be crushed and mixed with food.
 - Tablets can be chewed or swallowed whole.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain.

DESCRIPTION_EN: To relieve gastric upset.
NOTE_EN: Aluminium will only help the symptoms, it will not cure the disease. The symptoms will continue to come back if the cause is not found and treated.
FOOD_EN: Take after meals and at bedtime.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Constipation, nausea, vomiting.
INTERACTIONS_EN: Aluminium decreases absorption of: Ciprofloxacin, Chloroquine, Doxycycline, Isoniazid, Norfloxacin, Phenytoin, Rifampicin, Tetracycline.
INTERACTIONS_KA:
မၤလီၤစှၤကသံၣ်သ့ၣ်တဖၣ်အံၤ (Ciprofloxacin)၊ (Chloroquine)၊
 (Doxycycline)၊(Isoniazid)၊ (Norfloxacin)၊ (Phenytoin)၊
 (Rifampicin)၊ (Tetracycline) အသဟီၣ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: Anti-depressant (second choice after Fluoxetine and Sertraline).
DESCRIPTION_KA: ကသံၣ်ကူစါတၢ်သးဟးဂီၤ(တၢ်ဃုထၢကျဲခံဘိတဘိဖဲဟ့ၣ်၀ (Fluoxetine) ဒီး (Sertraline) ၀ံၤအလီၢ်ခံ)။
NOTE_EN:
- Do not give many tablets to a patient if you can not supervise, because taking an overdose of this medicine can cause death. 
 - Try to follow the patient every week for the first month.
 - To stop therapy, reduce slowly by 50 mg every 2 - 3 weeks.
FOOD_EN: Better to take with food to decrease gastric upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people have more risk of side-effects; heart disease; epilepsy, chronic constipation.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: If patient is actively trying to kill himself; together with Co-Artem; together with Tramadol; to patients with heart disease
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Sedation, feeling sleepy, abdominal pain, tiredeness, hypotension, oedema, palpitations, agitation, blurred vision, confusion, rash, constipation, urinary retention, dizziness, dry mouth, decreased libido.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Alcohol: more risk of feeling sleepy.
 - Carbamazepine, Phenobarbitone, Phenytoin: reduce effect of A.
 - A. decreases effect of Carbamazepine, Phenobarbitone, Phenytoin.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ၦၤဆါလၢအအဲၣ်ဒိးမၤသံလီၤသးတဖၣ်ဘၣ်၊ တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Co-Artem)၊ တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Tramadol)၊ တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ၦၤဆါလၢအအိၣ်ဒီး သးတၢ်ဆါတဖၣ်ဘၣ်။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
- တၢ်မူၤတၢ်ဘှီးမံခ့နးထီၣ်။ - (Carbamazepine)၊ (Phenobarbitone)၊ (Phenytoin) ကသံၣ်တဖၣ်အံၤ မၤလီၤစှၤ၀ဲ (Amitryptiline) အသဟီၣ်။ - (Amitryptiline)အံၤမၤလီၤစှၤ၀ဲကသံၣ် (Carbamazepine)၊
 (Phenobarbitone)၊ (Phenytoin) တဖၣ်အံၤအသဟီၣ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat High Blood Pressure (Hypertension)
NOTE_EN:
- Increase dose after 2 weeks in steps of 2.5 mg until BP is normal.
- Can be given in combination with Enalapril and Hydrochlorothiazide.
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN:
- If you hear a loud heart murmur (can not give in severe aortic stenosis): choose a different drug.
- Together with Mefloquine
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Oedema, dizziness, headache, cramps.
INTERACTIONS_EN: Amytriptiline: increases risk of hypotension.
NOTE_KA: - ၂နွံ၀ံၤအလီၢ်ခံန့ၣ်မၤအါထီၣ်ကသံၣ်အသဟီၣ်တုၤ၂ႉ၅ mg အပတီၢ်တုၤလၢ သွံၣ်တၢ်ဆီၣ်သနံးအိၣ်က့ၤဘၣ်လီၢ်ဘၣ်စးတက့ၢ်။ - ဟ့ၣ်တွဲဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ (Enalapril) ဒီး (Hydrochlorothiazide) တဖၣ်အံၤ သ့၀ဲလီၤ။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA:
- ဖဲနနၣ်ဟူအသးဖျၢၣ်ဖူသီၣ်ဒိၣ်ဒိၣ် (တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ၦၤလၢအအိၣ်ဒီး သးသွံၣ်ကျိၤအံၣ်
 တၢ်ဆါလၢအနးတဖၣ်ဘၣ် - (အါအိထံၣ် စတဲနိစံၣ်) ဟ့ၣ်လၢကသံၣ်အဂၤ။
 - ဃုာ်ဒီး (Mefloquine) တက့ၢ်။
INTERACTIONS_KA: -(Amytriptiline)မၤနးထီၣ်၀ဲၦၤလၢအိၣ်ဒီးသွံၣ်တၢ်ဆီၣ်သနံးစှၤလီၤ။

NOTE_EN: For how long to give depends on the severity of the disease: from 5 days to several weeks.
FOOD_EN:
- Can be taken with food or without food.
- For children can be mixed with milk, cold drink or juice.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: History of allergy (Amoxicillin, Ampicillin, Penicillin, Cloxacillin).

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic to treat severe bacterial infections (usually used together with Gentamicin):meningitis, severe pneumonia, sepsis, severe bone infections, severe bowel infections,severe trauma. 
Reconstitute one vial with 4.6 cc of sterile water -> 1 cc = 200 mg.
Dose for severe infections: 50 mg/kg
NOTE_EN:
- If possible, for children calculate by mg/kg.
- When patient is better, give half the dose.
- You can use Ceftriaxone instead of Ampicillin+Gentamicin

- မၢ့်သ့လၢဖိသၣ်ဂီၢ်ဒွးနၣ့်အီၤကသံၣ် (mg) ဒီးအသယၢၢ် (kg) အဖီခိၣ်နၣ့်တက့ၢ်။

 - သူကသံၣ် (Ceftriaxone) သ့လၢကသံၣ် (Ampicillin)+(Gentamicin) အခၢၣ်စးနၣ့်လီၤ။

Many medics use Atropine for abdominal pain/spasms, but its use for this problem is not recommended and its efficacy not sure.
It should not be used for abdominal pain.

SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Constipation, temporary slow heart rate, dilatation of the pupils, pain in the eyes when looking at a light, dry mouth

ကသံၣ်သရၣ်အါဂၤသူ၀ (Atropine) လၢဟၢဖၢဆါဂီၢ်ဘၣ်ဆၣ်ၦၤတတူၢ် လိာ်အီၤလၢ ကဘၣ်သူအီၤဘၣ်ဒီးတလီၤတံၢ်ဘၣ်နၣ့်လီၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic of the same group as Erythromycin.
More expensive, but more easy to use because is given once a day.
Useful to treat many bacterial infections: pneumonias, otitis, urethritis, tonsillitis, pharingytis, cellulitis, whooping cough (pertussis), cholera, STIs (see p. 130)
NOTE_EN:
-For community-acquired pneumonia give together with Ceftriaxone. For severe cases continue treatment for 7-10 days. 
- Together with re-hydration fluids, Azythromycin can shorten the duration of diarrhoea and reduce the volume of stool losses.
- Can be used in Typhoid Fever if there is resistance to Ciprofloxacin.
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with of without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Heart disease.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Heart failure, liver failure. With Aluminium and Artesunate.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Joint pain, dizziness, headache, numbness, vision problems, taste not normal, gas in bowel. Not common: oedema, chest pain.
INTERACTIONS_EN: Aluminium reduces absorption of Azythrom.: do not give together.
NOTE_KA:
ကသံၣ်လၢၦၤတ၀ၢလၢမၤန့ၢ်၀ဲလၢတၢ်ပသိၣ်တၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်အဂီၢ်တဖၣ်န့ၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်အီၤဒီး (Ceftriaxone) တက့ၢ်။ ၦၤလၢဆိက့၀ဲနးနးတဖၣ်န့ၣ်ဟ့ၣ်အါထီၣ်အီၤကသံၣ်၇သီ-၁၀သီအဂီၢ်။ - ဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ်အံသၣ်ထံတဖၣ် (Azythromycin) န့ၣ်မၤလီၤဖုၣ်၀ဲတၢ်အ့ၣ်လူ အကတီၢ်သ့၀ဲဒီးမၤလီၤစှၤတၢ်အ့ၣ်လူလီၤသ့၀ဲလီၤ။
 - သူ၀ဲလၢ(ထါဖၢၣ်)တၢ်လိၤကိၢ်သ့၀ဲဖဲအအီၣ်၀ဲ(Ciprofloxacin)တတဲာ်လၢၤဘၣ်အခါ။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: သးတမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်၊ သူၣ်တမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်၊ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ် (Aluminium)၊ (Artesunate)။
INTERACTIONS_KA: (Aluminium)န့ၣ်မၤလီၤစှၤ၀ဲ(Azythromycin) အသဟီၣ်လီၤ-တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်တပူၤဃီဘၣ်။

FOOD_EN: Give with a full glass of water. Do not chew.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people; high blood pressure; diarrhoea.

2. Increase with small dose every week until no more seizures.
DESCRIPTION_EN:
To treat epilepsy.
First choice for focal and general epilepsy.
FOOD_EN: Give with food or full glass of water to decrease stomach upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Heart disease, kidney disease, liver disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
Nausea and vomiting, dizziness, drowsiness, headache, confusion, vision problems (especially seing double), rash, blood disorders. 
Blurring of vision and dizziness are dose-related and will go away if the dose is decreased or sometimes if time of taking the medication is changed.

DOSAGE_EN: 1 cap = 250 or 500 mg For UTI prophylaxis (prevention) DOSE: 12.5 mg/kg at night Open 1 (250) caps and dilute powder with 5 cc of water -> 1 cc = 50 mg
DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic for bacterial infections: skin and soft tissue infections, urine tract infections, urine tract infections prophylaxis (prevention), pneumonia.
1st choice antibiotic for not-compicated Urinary Tract Infections.
NOTE_EN:
- For simple UTI (lower UTI) give for 3 days. 
 - In pregnancy give for 7 days.
 - For complicated UTI (pyelonephritis) give for 7-10 days.
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with food or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
- Patients with epilepsy: high levels can increase risk of seizures.
- Patients with kidney disease: decrease dose if kidney functions is not normal.
- Patients who had a rash or oedema after using Amoxicillin or Penicillin.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: If history of severe rash using Ceftriaxone
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Rash, headache, feeling sick (nausea, diarrhoea, stomach pain).
INTERACTIONS_EN: Zinc can decrease absorption of Cefalexin. Do not give together

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Anti-allergic which does not make people too sleepy.
For urticaria and allergic reactions (does not treat the cause, only the symptoms).
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with or without food
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people, people with liver and kidney diseases, epilepsy, people who drink alcohol, people who work with machinery or driving.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Headache (especially in children), drowsiness, abdominal pain.
INTERACTIONS_EN: Alcohol increases drowsiness.

DESCRIPTION_KA: ကသံၣ်ကူစါလၢတၢ်ဆါတကလုာ်လၢအဟဲကဲထီၣ်သးလၢ ဂာ်တဖီးတၢ်ဒိဆၢက့ၤတၢ် (ဂာ်တဖီးဒီးတၢ်တမံၤမံၤ(ရှီၣ်)၊ သူဃုာ်ဒီး ((Adrenaline)။ အဆိကတၢၢ်နၣ့်ဟ့ၣ်ကသံၣ်((Adrenaline)။
NOTE_EN:
Use 1 cc syringe if possible.
Give IV injection slowly, over 1 - 2 minutes.

DESCRIPTION_EN: Antibiotic to be used for specific bacterial infections.
NOTE_EN: Can be useful also in: bone, joint and gastro-intestinal infections.
FOOD_EN: Good to give with food to decrease gastric upset, but do NOT give with milk or yogurt.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Epilepsy; G6PD deficiency, kidney failure, children, old people, liver disease, people with diabetes.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN:
- NSAID (Ibuprofen, Indomethacin, Diclofenac...), Erythromycin, Amytriptiline.
- In people with heart failure, hypertension, old people (unless there is no other option).
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Abdominal pain; dizziness; sleep disorders; convulsions;  jaundice. Not common: psychoses, photosensitivity. SEVERE: Tendinopathy and tendon rupture, peripheral neuropathy. Can be irreversible.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Ferrous/Iron, Aluminium, Calcium and Zinc decrease absorption of Ciprofloxacin and decrease effect: give at separate times of the day (not together).
 - People taking anti-diabetic drugs may lose control of blood sugar when they take Ciprofloxacin.
 - Prednisolone and Dexamethasone may increase risk of tendon rupture.
 - Ciprofloxacin may decrease effect of Phenytoin.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA:
- NSAID ကရူၢ်တဖၣ (Ibuprofen၊ Indomethacin၊ Diclofenac)၊
 (Erythromycin)၊ (Amytriptiline)။ - လၢၦၤအအိၣ်ဒီး သးဖျၢၣ်တမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်၊ သွံၣ်တၢ်ဆီၣ်သနံးထီၣ်၊ ၦၤသးၦၢ် (တၢ်ဃုထၢအဂၤမ့ၢ်တအိၣ်လၢၤဘၣ်ဒီးဟ့ၣ်သ့လီၤ)။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
- ကသံၣ် (Ferrous/Iron)၊ (Aluminium)၊ (Calcium) ဒီး (Zinc) ကထုးစှၤလီၤကသံၣ် (Ciprofloxacin) အသဟီၣ်တဘၣ်အီၣ်အီၤလၢ တၢ်ဆၢကတီၢ်တကတီၢ်ဃီပူၤဘၣ် (တမ့ၢ်တပူၤဃီဘၣ်)။
 - ၦၤလၢအအီၣ်၀ဲကသံၣ်တြီဆၢဆံၣ်ဆၢတၢ်ဆါတဖၣ်န့ၣ်ဖဲအ၀ဲသ့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Ciprofloxacin) ကသံၣ်အခါန့ၣ်ကသံၣ်အံၤတြီဆၢတၢ်ဆၢလၢသွံၣ်ကျါ တန့ၢ်ဂ့ၤဂ့ၤလၢၤဘၣ်။ - (Prednisolone) ဒီး (Dexamethasone) ကမၤအါထီၣ်၀ဲတၢ်ကီတၢ်ခဲ လၢထူၣ်ပျၢ်သ့ၣ်ဖးကျါလီၤ။ - (Ciprofloxacin) မၤလီၤစှၤ၀ဲ (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်လီၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic for specific bacterial infections: bone and joints infections (osteomyelitis, septic arthritis), diabetic foot, tooth infections.
Used in combination with Artesunate or Quinine for PF malaria (see pag. 175).
NOTE_EN:
- Can be used in patients with sepsis in combination with Ceftriaxone if you do not have Metronidazole iv or oral .
- To use in Malaria treatment see: PF Malaria treatment
FOOD_EN:
- Can be taken with or without food.
- Good to take with a full glass of water to avoid oesophageal upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Liver disease
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Small children
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Diarrhoea (if severe STOP immediately), nausea, rash.
NOTE_KA: - ၦၤဆါလၢအအိၣ်ဒီးတၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်လၢသွံၣ်တဖၣ်န့ၣ်တၢ်ဟ့ၣ်အီၤသ့၀ဲဃုာ်ဒီး (Ceftriaxone) ဖဲ (Metronidazole) ကသံၣ်ဆဲးမ့တမ့ၢ်ကသံၣ်အီၣ်တအိၣ်ဘၣ် အခါလီၤ။ - တၢ်မ့ၢ်သူအီၤလၢတၢ်ကူဆါတၢ်ညၣ်ဂိၢ်ဃၢ်အဂီၢ်န့ၣ်ကွၢ်လၢတၢ်ကူဆါတၢ်ညၣ်ဂိၢ် ဃၢ် (PF) အပူၤတက့ၢ်(ကဘျံးပၤ ၁၇၅)။

DESCRIPTION_EN: See MALARIA PROTOCOLS
Antibiotic used in chronic bone and respiratory infections, together with Metronidazole and Amoxicillin. Useful in skin infections.
DESCRIPTION_KA:
ကသံၣ်မၤသံ (ဘၣ်ထံရံယၤ) ဃၢ်ဘၣ်တၢ်သူအီၤလၢဃံဒီးကလံၤကျိၤ တၢ်ဆါဃၢ်နုာ် လၢအယံာ်အထၢ သ့ၣ်တဖၣ်နၣ့်လီၤႉကသံၣ်၀ဲအံၤဘၣ်သူဃုာ်အီၤဒီး (Metronidazole) ဒီး (Amoxicillin)။
 ကဲဘျုးလၢဖံးဘ့ၣ်တၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်နၣ့်လီၤ။
NOTE_EN: In chronic bone and respiratory infections give for 4 - 8 weeks in combination with Metronidazole and Amoxicillin.
FOOD_EN: Take 30 minutes before food.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Jaundice, haemolytic anaemia.
NOTE_KA: ဃံတၢ်ဆါအယံာ်အထၢဒီးကလံာ်ကျိၤတၢ်ဆါဃၢ်နုာ်အဂီၢ်ဟ့ၣ် ၄-၈နွံဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ် (Metronidazole) ဒီး (Amoxicillin)။

DESCRIPTION_EN: Anti-fungal. To treat skin ringworms. Not very effective for scalp ringworm. Not effective for nail ringworm.
Antibiotic for bacteria infections when Amoxicillin does not work: respiratory tract infections, bone and joint infections, abdominal infections, cellulitis, tooth infections.
DESCRIPTION_KA: ကသံၣ်မၤသ (ဘၣ်ထံရံယၤ) ဃၢ်လၢမၤသ (ဘၣ်ထံရံယၤ) ဃၢ်နုာ်တဖၣ်ဖ (Amoxicillin) တမၤလၢၤတၢ်မၤအခါ- ကလံၤကျိၤတၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်၊ ဃံဒီးစုကမဲာ်ခီၣ်ကမဲာ်တၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်၊ ဟၢဖၢပူၤတၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်၊ ဖံးဘ့ၣ်တၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်တၢ်ဆါ၊ မဲဃၢ်တၢ်ဆါ။
FOOD_EN: Better to take with food to decrease stomach upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
- Liver damage is more common using Co-amoxiclav than Amoxicillin alone. 
- Do not give therapy for longer than 14 days if possible.
- Stop if signs of liver damage (jaundice).
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Liver disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Diarrhoea can be more severe than with Amoxicillin alone.
BE_CAREFUL_KA:
- နမ့ၢ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Co-amoxiclav) န့ၣ်ကမၤဘၣ်ဒိနသူၣ်အါန့ၢ်ဒံးဖဲနအီၣ်ထဲ (Amoxicillin)တခါဧိၤလီၤ။
 - မ့ၢ်သ့န့ၣ်တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်အီၤအါန့ၢ်တဆံလွံၢ်သီတဂ့ၤ။
 - ပတုာ်ကွံာ်ကသံၣ်အီၣ်အံၤဖဲၦၤဆါအံၤတၢ်ပနီၣ်ဖျါလၢအသူၣ်ဘၣ်ဒိ(လီၤဘီ)။
SIDE_EFFECTS_KA: ကအ့ၣ်လူ၀ဲနးဒိၣ်ထီၣ်၀ဲဖဲတၢ်ဟ့ၣ်အီၣ်အီၤထဲ (Amoxicillin) တခါဧိၤအခါလီၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic for respiratory infections, skin bacterial infections, cellulitis, ear infections, animal bite infections, pneumonias in chronic pulmonary disease, proSTATitis, septic arthritis, diabetes foot infections, bone infections (in combination with Doxycycline).
You can use to treat acute Pneumonia, but if no improvement in 2 days, switch to Amoxicillin.
FOOD_EN:
- Can take with or without food.
- Give with at least one full glass of water.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Asthma; G6PD deficiency.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Blood disorders; liver or kidney failure; < 6 weeks of age.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Headache, liver damage, blood disorders, renal disorders, pancreatitis.
INTERACTIONS_EN: Cotrimoxazole increases effect of Phenytoin.
BREAST_FEEDING_EN: Be careful if the newborn baby has jaundice.
LENGTH_OF_TREATMENT_EN:
Length of treatment: 
- For proSTATitis: 4 – 6 weeks.
- For septic arthritis: 4 tablets BID for 3 - 4 weeks.
INTERACTIONS_KA: (Cotrimoxazole) ကမၤအါထီၣ်ကသံၣ် (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: There are NO indications for use of oral diazepam outside hospital.People can become addicted after only 2 weeks of use. Diazepam tablets should NOT be used outside hospital. To stop acute fitting (= seizures, convulsions).
NOTE_EN:

Give injection over 3 - 5 minutes.If you can not find a vein, you can use Diazepam per rectum (PR)TO GIVE PR:
 • Insert the syringe (without needle!) into rectum 4 - 5 cm and inject.
 • Hold buttocks together for a few minutes.
Can give a 3rd dose after 10 more minutes if still having seizures.

DESCRIPTION_EN: See MALARIA PROTOCOLS
Antibiotic useful for many infections.Can be used in combination to treat malaria (see Malaria Protocol pag. 173).
NOTE_EN: If you suspect Scrub Typhus, can give also to pregnant women. But if you have available, use Azythromycin.
FOOD_EN:
- Better to give with food or milk to decrease gastric upset. 
- Give with a full cup of water.
- Have the patient sit upright for at least 30 minutes after taking the capsules.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Liver disease.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Children < 8 years (except if there is no other option).
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
- Nausea/gastric pain, vomiting. 
- If patient starts to have a bad headache or vision problems: stop the drug.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Aluminium, Iron and Zinc decrease absorption of Doxycycline.
- Carbamazepine and Phenobarbitone decrease effect of Doxycycline
PREGNANCY_EN:
- Do not give. 
- Exception: Scrub Typhus.
LENGTH_OF_TREATMENT_EN:
- Pneumonias, animal bites, cellulitis : 1 - 2 weeks
- Scrub typhus, ear infections, mouth infections, sinusitis, urine infections: 5 - 7 days
- Bone infections (together with Cotrimoxazole): 8 weeks
- Leptospirosis 1 week
- Early syphilis: 2 weeks
- Late syphilis 4 weeks
- Filariasis 6 - 8 weeks
DOXY_AND_CHILDREN_EN: For a long time it has been advised not to use Doxycycline in children less than 8 years of age as it was thought it could cause discoloration of teeth and incomplete tooth development. However new studies have showed that these side-effects are linked especially to Tetracyclines and not to Doxyxycline. If no other therapy is available
NOTE_KA: နမ့ၢ်ဆိကမိၣ်လၢ (Scrub Typhus) နဟ့ၣ်ၦၤမိၢ်ဒၢစ့ၢ်ကီးသ့၀ဲလီၤ။ ဘၣ်ဆၣ်နတၢ်မ့ၢ်အိၣ်န့ၣ်ဟ့ၣ (Azythromycin) တက့ၢ်။
INTERACTIONS_KA: - (Aluminium)၊ (Iron) ဒီး (Zinc) ထုးလီၤစှၤ (Doxycycline) အသဟီၣ်။ - (Carbamazepine) ဒီး (Phenobarbitone) မၤလီၤစှၤ (Doxycycline)အသဟီၣ်နၢ့်လီၤ။
PREGNANCY_KA:
- တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဘၣ်။
 - နဟ့ၣ်သ့ဖဲၦၤမိၢ်ဒၢအံၤမ့ၢ်ဘၣ် (Scrub Typhus) အခါ။
DOXY_AND_CHILDREN_KA: တၢ်တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ် (Doxycycline) အံၤလၢဖိသၣ်လၢအနံၣ်စှၤန့ၢ်ဃီးနံၣ်ဆူ အဖီလာ်ဘၣ်တၢ်အံၤမ့ၢ် တၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ကူၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဖးယံၤလံလီၤႉ တၢ်အံၤၦၤဆိမိၣ် လၢကဆီတလဲကွံာ် မဲအလွဲၢ်ဒီးမဲတဖၣ်တဒိၣ်ထီၣ်ထီထီၣ်၀ဲဂ့ၤဂ့ၤဘၣ်လီၤ။ ဒ်လဲၣ်ဂ့ၤၦၤမၤလိန့ၢ်တၢ်အသီတဖၣ်တဲ၀ဲလၢတၢ်ကဲထီၣ်သးတၢ်ပိာ်ထွဲအံၤ လီၤဆီဒၣ်တၢ်ဘၣ်ထွဲ၀ဲလၢ (Tetracyclines) လီၤတမ့ၢ် (Doxycycline) ဘၣ်။ ကသံၣ်အဂၤမ့ၢ်တအိၣ်ဘၣ်ဒီးဟ့ၣ (Doxycycline) အံၤဆူဖိသၣ် လၢစှၤန့ၢ်ဃီးနံၣ် ဆူအဖီလာ်သ့၀ဲလီၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN: See MALARIA PROTOCOLS
To treat high blood pressure, heart failure. If possible, ask a doctor for advice.
NOTE_EN: Can be given in combination with Amlodipine and Hydrochlorothiazide.
FOOD_EN: Can take with or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: If possible, avoid using in people with kidney problems
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Together with Spironolactone (there is risk of high Potassium).
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Blood Pressure can decrease too much, kidney problems, dry cough, high Potassium.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Aluminium decreases absorption of Enalapril.
- Alcohol, Atenonolol, Hydrochlorothiazide, Furosemide increase effect.
NOTE_KA: ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ်ပာ်ဖှိၣ်ဃုာ် (Amlodipine) ဒီး (Hydrochlorothiazide)သ့။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Spironolactone) တၢ်ဘၣ်ယိၣ်အိၣ်လၢ (Potassium)ကအါထီၣ်ဒိၣ်တလၢန့ၣ်လီၤ။
SIDE_EFFECTS_KA: သွံၣ်အတၢ်ဆီၣ်သနံးကလီၤစှၤဒိၣ်တလၢ၊ ကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ကီတၢ်ခဲ၊ကိး ဃ့ထီ၊ (Potassium) အါထီၣ်။
INTERACTIONS_KA: - (Aluminium) ထုးလီၤစှၤကသံၣ (Enalapril) အသဟီၣ်။ - (Alcohol, Atenonolol, Hydrochlorothiazide, Furosemide) မၤအါထီၣ်ကသံၣ် (Enalapril) အသဟီၣ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: See DRUGS USED FOR POST PARTUM HAEMORRAGE (PPH) and MISSED or INCOMPLETE ABORTION
Antibiotic for bacterial respiratory, oral and skin infections, Sexually Transmitted Infections (STIs). Alternative for patients allergic to penicillin/amoxicillin
DESCRIPTION_KA:
ကသံၣ်မၤသံ (ဘၣ်ထံရံယၤ) ဃၢ်လၢကလံၤကျိၤဒီးကိာ်ပူၤတၢ်ပူၤလီၢ်ထီၣ်၊ ဖံးဘ့ၣ်တၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်ဒီး
 တၢ်ဃၢ်နုာ်ခီဖျိတၢ်မံဃုာ်လိာ်သး။
 ၦၤဆါလၢအတဖီးဒီး ; (Penicillin/Amoxicillin) သ့ၣ်တဖၣ်သူက့ၤကသံၣ် (Erythromycin) န့ၣ်တက့ၢ်။
FOOD_EN: Can take with or without food. But if possible take after food to decrease stomach upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Liver disease and kidney disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Nausea, diarrhoea, rashes.

MEDICATION: Ferrous Iron - Ferrous Sulfate - Ferrous Fumarate

DESCRIPTION_EN: For treatment and prevention of anaemia.
NOTE_EN: These guidelines are for a population where the prevalence of anaemia is > 40%, as in Karen State and many parts of Burma. - Tell the people that stool will become dark in colour There are different Iron Salts (Sulphate, Fumarate, Gluconate) which contain different quantity of Elemental Iron. The most commonly used are tablets of Ferrous Sulphate or Multi-vitamins containing Ferrous Fumarate (like Foli C or FBC or Obimin, etc.).
FOOD_EN: In theory it is better to take on empty stomach. But many people get stomach upset and stop taking treatment. If stomach upset, take with food. Do not give with milk or yogurt
BE_CAREFUL_EN: If a child swallows many tablets the child can die. Keep the tablets away from children.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Often stomach pain if taken BID or TID; constipation.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Ferrous decreases absorption of Ciprofloxacin and Doxycycline.
- Ferrous decreases effect of Methyldopa.
LENGTH_OF_TREATMENT_EN:
Alternate-day dosing (or Monday, Wednesday, Friday if it is
 easier to remember) has been shown to result in greater
 absorption of iron and less side-effects. It is good to tell
 patients to take iron like this. But if you think that the
 patients will not remember, tell them to take tablets
 every day 3) FOR HOW LONG - For Prevention: 3 consecutive months in a year.
 - For Treatment: 3 months are needed to get Haemoglobin
 to normal levels, 3 months to rebuild the iron stores in the
 liver: total 6 months.

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat Diabetes Type 2. Alone or in combination with Metformin when this one alone can not control blood sugar levels.
DESCRIPTION_KA: ကသံၣ်ကူစါဆံၣ်ဆၢတၢ်ဆါခံကလုာ်တကလုာ်၊တၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ကသံၣ် (Gliclazide) ထဲတခါမ့တမ့ၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ကသံၣ် ဃုာ်ဒီး (Metformin) ဖဲကသံၣ် (Gliclazide) တခါအံၤတြီဆၢ၀ဲအံသၣ်ဆၢလၢသွံၣ်ကျါတန့ၢ်လၢၤဘၣ်အခါ။
NOTE_EN: Teach patients to recognise symptoms of low blood sugar (sweating, weak, confusion, nightmares) and take fruit or food or sugar to raise blood sugar. If having low blood sugar frequently, reduce dose of Gliclazide.
FOOD_EN:
- Take with meals at same time every day. 
- If people eat less or do not eat, tell them not to take the medicine that day.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people can get more easily in hypoglycaemia (very low sugar); G6PD deficiency
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: In people with heart disease who are taking Atenolol or Propranolol or other drugs of the same family (Beta-blockers)
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Low blood sugar, high blood pressure, headache, dizziness diarrhoea, back and joint pain, viral infections, bronchitis.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Gliclazide can increase toxic effect of Alcohol.
- Atenolol and Ciprofloxacin can increase risk of hypoglycaemia.
- Hydrochlorothiazide may decrease effect of Gliclazide
BREAST_FEEDING_EN: Can give, but mother needs to be careful not to go into hypoglycaemia.
IMPORTANT_EN:
Start with 40 mg to be taken with breakfast. If blood sugar still high, increase by 40 mg every 2 weeks. Stop increasing dose as soon as blood sugar level is normal.
Maximum dose 160 mg BID.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ၦၤလၢအိၣ်ဒီးသးတၢ်ဆါလၢအီၣ်၀ဲ (Atenolol) မ့တမ့ၢ် (Propranolol) ဒီးမ့တမ့ၢ်ကသံၣ်အဂၤလၢအမ့ၢ်တကလုာ်ဃီဒီး (Betablockers) အံၤတက့ၢ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat high blood pressure. Start treatment only if BP > 160/110 on at least 3 checks over several weeks and if youcan follow the patient with supply of drugs (it is a chronic disease!). Start treatment immediately only if BP > 220/120.
NOTE_EN:
- Doses higher than 25 mg usually are not more effective and give more side-effects.
- Give in the morning to avoid passing urine at night
FOOD_EN: Can take with or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Diabetes, gout, kidney diseases, malnutrition,liver disease, Systemic Lupus Erythematosus.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Severe liver disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Low Potassium, low sodium, hypotension, high glucose, high uric acid, gout.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Alcohol, Furosemide, Prednisolone increase effect of Hydroclorothiazide.
- Carbamazepine, Prednisolone: more risk of low sodium.
- Ibuprofen, Indomethacin, etc.: more risk of kidney damage, and less diuretic effect.
- Hydroclorothiazide decreases effect of Anti-diabetic drugs.
- Hydroclorothiazide increases concentration of Fluconazole.
IMPORTANT_EN:
Start on a drug to treat high blood pressure only after patient has tried for 1- 2 months to have a healthy lifestyle with regular exercise and a healthy diet: reduce intake of salt, alcohol, coffee, sugary drinks; stop or reduce smoking and reduce weight if overweight.
- When starting therapy explain that the tablets have to be taken longterm. If the patients stop taking the tablets when they feel better, the blood pressure will go up again.
- The tablets do NOT CURE the high blood pressure, but only CONTROL.
- If possible, check Creatinine before starting and then every year.

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat pain, inflammation, fever with discomfort in children.
NOTE_EN: People’s bodies react in different ways to anti-inflammatories: one medicine can be good for one person but not for another. For example: one person can improve with Ibuprofen but not with Diclofenac; another can improve with Diclofenac but not with Ibuprofen; another can improve with Indomethacin and not with Diclofenac, etc. This means that if a person does not get better with one, you can try another one and then another one. Anti-inflammatories found in different clinics: Aspirin, Diclofenac, Ibuprofen, Indomethacin, Ketoprofen, Meloxicam, Naproxen.
FOOD_EN: Take with food or milk to avoid gastric upset
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people, kidney problems, asthma, heart problems.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Peptic ulcer (new and old); Dengue fever, together with Aspirin, allergy to Aspirin, kidney failure, severe heart failure, severe liver disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Stomach pain,peptic ulcers, kidney damage, rash, headache, dizziness, hearing problems; kidney failure.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Ciprofloxacin and Norfloxacin: more risk of convulsions.
- Dexamethasone and Prednisolone (corticosteroid group): more risk of stomach bleeding.
- Furosemide and Hydrochlothiazide: more risk of kidney damage.
- Ibuprofen increases effects of Phenytoin.
- Ibuprofen decreases effects of Atenolol and Propanolol.
NOTE_KA: ၦၤကညီမိၢ်ၦၢ်န့ၣ်အံၤမၤဆၢ၀ဲကသံၣ်မၤဘျါတၢ်ညီးအံၤလၢကျဲအါဘိလီၤ။ကသံၣ်တခါန့ၣ် ကဂ့ၤ၀ဲလၢၦၤတဂၤအဂီၢ်ဘၣ်ဆၣ်တဂ့ၤလၢၦၤအဂၤတဂၤအဂီၢ်သ့၀ဲလီၤ။ အဒိ=ၦၤတဂၤန့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲကသံၣ (Ibuprofen) ဒီးကိညၢ်လီၤ၀ဲဘၣ်ဆၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Diclofenac) တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်။ ၦၤအဂၤတဂၤန့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Diclofenac) ဒီးကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ဆၣ်မ့ၢ်အီၣ် (Ibuprofen) န့ၣ်တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်။ ၦၤအဂၤတဂၤန့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Indomethacin) ဒီးကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ဆၣ်မ့ၢ်အီၣ် (Diclofenac) န့ၣ်တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်။ လၢတၢ်န့ၣ်၊အဃိၦၤတဂၤအံၤအီၣ်၀ဲ ကသံၣ်အံၤ မ့ၢ်တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ဒီဟ့ၣ်အီၤကသံၣ်အဂၤတခါ၀ံၤအဂၤတခါတက့ၢ်။  တၢ်မၤဘျါတၢ်ညီးအကသံၣ်လၢအိၣ်၀ဲဒၣ်လၢကသံၣ်ဒၢးတဖၣ်= (Aspirin)၊ (Diclofenac)၊(Ibuprofen)၊(Indomethacin)၊ (Ketoprofen)၊ (Meloxicam)၊ Naproxen။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ကဖုတၢ်ဆါ(အသီဒီးလီၢ်လံၤ)၊ ဒဲကံၢ်တိၤကွ့၊ တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Aspirin) တဂ့ၤ၊ၦၤလၢအတဖီးဒီး (Aspirin)၊ ကလ့ၢ်တမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်၊သးဖျၢၣ်တမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်အ နး၊ သူၣ်တၢ်ဆါလၢအနးနၣ့်လီၤ။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
-(Ciprofloxacin)ဒီး(Norfloxacin)-တၢ်ဘၣ်ယိၣ်အါထီၣ်လၢတၢ်ထီၣ်တၢ်ဆါအဂီၢ်။

BE_CAREFUL_EN: Kidney disease, heart failure.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: With Carbamazepine, Dexamethasone, Domperidone, Phenobarbitone, Phenytoin, Prednisolone, Rifampicin.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Diarrhoea, nausea, headache, heart failure, rash, vomiting, constipation, loss of hair, peripheral neuropathy
INTERACTIONS_EN:

DESCRIPTION_EN:
First choice drug to treat Diabetes Type 2 and Diabetes which develops during pregnancy.
Alone or in combination with other anti-diabetic drugs (Glipizide or Gliclazide).
DESCRIPTION_KA: တၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ကသံၣ်ကျဲအခီၣ်ထံးတဘိလၢတၢ်ယါဘျါ၀ဲဆံၣ်ဆၢတၢ်ဆါခံကလုာ်တကလုာ်ဒီးဆံၣ်ဆၢတၢ် ဆါလၢအအါထီၣ်၀ဲဖဲၦၤဒၢအဆၢကတီၢ်။ ဟ့ၣ်ထဲတခါဧိၤမ့တမ့ၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ကသံၣ်ပာ်ဖှိၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး ကသံၣ်မၤဘျါဆံၣ်ဆၢတၢ်ဆါအဂၤတဖၣ်တက့ၢ် (Glipizide) မ့တမ့ၢ် (Gliclazide)။
NOTE_EN:
- Start with 500 mg to be taken with breakfast. 
- If blood sugar is still high after 2 weeks, increase by 500 mg every 2 weeks. 
- Stop increasing as soon as blood sugar level is normal.
- Maximum dose 1000 mg BID.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
- STOP if nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea.
- STOP if patient dehydrated (careful in old people).
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Kidney disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Heart palpitations, low blood sugar, decreased absorption of B12
INTERACTIONS_EN: High alcohol intake can give severe syndrome(lactic acidosis).
IMPORTANT_EN: Start with 500 mg to be taken with breakfast. If blood sugar still high, increase by 500 mg / day every 2 weeks. Stop increasing dose as soon as blood sugar level is normal. Maximum dose 2000 mg (2 g) BID.

NOTE_EN:
- Most of the patients with peptic ulcer will be better after 4 weeks with 20 mg once a day, but some patients will require double dose and 8 weeks treatment.
- Some patients with oesophageal reflux might need up to 12 weeks treatment.
- Stop anti-inflammatories drugs.
- If a person need chronic therapy with antiinflammatory drugs, can give together all the time to prevent ulcer.
- If used for 8 weeks or more, do not stop suddenly, but step down slowly, to avoid worsening of the symptoms.

- If taken twice a day, take second dose 30 minutes before dinner or before going to bed. 
- Do not chew or crush.
- Avoid spicy food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
- Liver disease.
- If possible do not give to patients older than 65 years.

- Sometimes agitation, dizziness, fatigue, itchy body.

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat epilepsy.
NOTE_EN:
- If still having seizures with maximum dose, need to change drug.
 - Patients should continue to take it all the time. If no seizures in 2 years time, then you can try to slowly reduce and stop.
 - If patient starts having seizures again, Phen. has to be started again.
 - Never stop suddenly, always decrease slowly.
 - In long term therapy, consider giving Calcium and vit. D.
FOOD_EN:
- Can take with or without food.
 - Increase intake of food rich in Calcium.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Children and old people; alcohol abuse; liver and kidney disease.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Severe liver disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Hepatitis, low blood pressure, drowsiness, sleepiness, hyperactivity, poor memory; hallucinations.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Alcohol increases sleepiness.
 - Phenobarbitone decreases effect of Doxycycline, Metronidazole, Combined Oral Contraceptives (COC), Depo.
PREGNANCY_EN:
- Benefits usually greater than risks. 
 - Consult with a doctor if possible.
BREAST_FEEDING_EN:
- Benefits usually greater than risks. 
- Consult with a doctor if possible.
- Baby can become drowsy.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: သူၣ်တၢ်ဆါလၢအနး။
INTERACTIONS_KA: မ့ၢ်အီသံးနၣ့်ဘၣ်သးမံခ့အါထီၣ်။. (Phenobarbitone) မၤလီၤစှၤကသံၣ် (Doxycycline) ၊ (Metronidazole) ဒီးကသံၣ်ဟုးစၢ်လၢအအီဒီးအဆဲးတဖၣ်အသဟီၣ်နၣ့်လီၤ။.

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat epilepsy (general and focal ).
NOTE_EN:
- If possible check drug blood levels every 6 months, as good levels and toxic levels are very near.
- Give B1,6,12 tablets to prevent disease of the peripheral nerves.
- Very important to tell patients to clean well their gums and teeth 2-3 times a day.
FOOD_EN: Better to take on empty stomach.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: G6PD deficiency
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN:
- With Co-artem (Phenytoin decreases effect), Sertraline.
 - If heart rate is < 50/min.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
Swollen gums, peripheral neuropathy (damage to peripheral nerves with tingling and numbness), rash, acne, anaemia, difficult sleeping, twitching. 
Toxic: double vision, tremor,difficulty speaking, confusion, changes in behaviour, walking with legs apart (ataxia).
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Phenytoin decreases effect of Amlodipine, Albendazole, Doxycycline, Dexamethasone, Prednisolone, Itraconazole, Praziquantel.
- Ciprofloxacin can increase or decrease effects of Phenytoin.
- Fluconazole can increase effects of Phenytoin.
- Isoniazid and Metronidazole can increase risk of peripheral neuropathy.
- Rifampicin can decrease effects of Phenytoin.
FOOD_KA: ဂ့ၤဒိၣ်လၢကဘၣ်အီၣ်လၢဟၢဖၢပူၤတၢ်တအိၣ်နီတမံၤဘၣ်အခါလီၤ။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: မ့ၢ်အီၣ်ဃုာ် (Co-artem) န့ၣ် (Phenytoin အသဟီၣ်ကလီၤစှၤ၀ဲ)၊ (Sertraline) ။. ဖဲသးဖျၢၣ်ဟူး၀းပနီၣ်အိၣ်စှၤန့ၢ်၅၀လၢတမံးနံးအတီၢ်ပူၤ။
INTERACTIONS_KA: (Phenytoin) န့ၣ်မၤလီၤစှၤ၀ဲ (Amlodipine)၊(Albendazole)၊(Doxycycline)၊(Dexamethasone)၊(Prednisolone)၊(Itraconazole)၊(Praziquantel) အသဟီၣ်။. (Ciprofloxacin) မၤအါထီၣ်မ့တမ့ၢ်မၤလီၤစှၤ (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်သ့လီၤ။. (Fluconazole)မၤအါထီၣ်၀ဲ (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်သ့၀ဲလီၤ။. (Isoniazid) ဒီး (Metronidazole) မၤနးထီၣ်၀ဲစုခီၣ်ထူၣ်ပျၢ်ဟးဂီၤတၢ်ဆါသ့၀ဲ။. (Rifampicin) မၤလီၤစှၤ၀ဲ (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်သ့၀ဲလီၤ။.

DESCRIPTION_EN: For severe allergic reaction, asthma, Nephrotic Syndrome, Rheumatic Fever.
DESCRIPTION_KA: တၢ်ဆါလၢဟဲကဲထီၣ်သးဒီးဂာ်တဖီးတၢ်ဒိဆၢက့ၤတၢ်လၢအနး၊ တၢ်သးဘံး၊ ကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ဆါ(Nephrotic Syndrome)ဒီး(ရူၢ်မဲၣ်တံၣ်)တၢ်ကိၢ်ထီၣ်။
NOTE_EN:
- Better to take it in the morning in a single dose after breakfast.
 - Give Albendazole to prevent worm spread.
 - Be sure patient does not have TB if giving long course (can make it worse).
 - Do not stop suddenly if given for more than 3 weeks, but decrease slowly.

BE_CAREFUL_EN: Hypertension, heart failure, liver and kidney disease, diabetes, osteoporosis, glaucoma, epilepsy, peptic ulcer, hypothyroidism.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Peptic ulcer.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
In chronic use: 
Diabetes, osteoporosis, gastric upset, increased severity of infections, candida, epilepsy, glaucoma, cataract, muscle weakness, bone fracture, tendon rupture, increased weight, irregular periods.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- NSAID (Ibuprofen, Indomethacin) and Aspirin: more risk of bleeding from stomach and bowel.
- Prednisolone reduces effect of Anti-diabetics, Atenolol, Propranolol, Furosemide, Hydochlorothiazide and Methyldopa
PREGNANCY_EN: Can give max 40 mg OD for short courses (up to 5 days).
BREAST_FEEDING_EN: Can give max 40 mg OD for short courses (up to 5 days).
